item.description:
The first Friday of each month the Center of Light Boston sponsors a free Conscious Movie Night.

This month's movie will be St. John of the Cross. Along with being a religious figure, St. John of the Cross was a radical in his time calling for the reformation of his church doctrine to be in line with Jesus' teachings of peace and love.

In our times, we can all use good examples of non-violent, humble and active workers for peace. St. John of the Cross is one such example.

This event will be held at 7:30 pm on Friday, March 2 at 97 Perkins Street, Jamaica Plain. I hope you will join me for popcorn and peaceful conversation.
Feel free to contact me should you have any questions.
Peace,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Conscious Movie Night
